page.title: 15Event - Digwyddiad.
page.content: January 31 at the other end of the parishthe funeral of Mrs Elen Willians.There were no V.I.Ps,only a fair number of local people braving the winter weather. In contrast to Lord Harlech's life, she had spent most of hers scratching a livelyhood on her small hillside farm.She received very little education and rarely travelled beyond sight of the farm. She died after a short illness and was 84 years old. The wealth that she had, she took with her in her amiable personality, her ability to portray life in the past and a sound knowledge of Welsh sayings and idioms. She too bore crosses losing two sons aged 7 and 9 in a tragic accident, drowning in a local lake which was frozen.Her husband died soon after.
